data.title: Bibi Gaytan Height, Weight, Measurements, Bra Size, Shoe Size
data.meta_description: Bibi Gaytan Height, Weight, Measurements, Bra Size, Shoe Size, Hair Color, Eye Color, Parents, Siblings, Zodiac Sign, Husband, Family.
data.text:
Bibi Gaytan is a Mexican Singer and Actress. She considered herself “Tabasquena”. Bibi Gaytan became popular for played roles in TV serials such as, Dos mujeres, un camino, Alcanzar una estrella II, Baila conmigo, and Camila. She has released many albums, singles and extended plays.

Bibi Gaytan’s height is 5 feet 6 inches and her weight is 54 kilograms. Her body measurement is 34-24-34 inches. Bibi Gaytan’s Bra Size is 34B. Her dress size is 4 (US) and her shoe size is 7.5 (US). Bibi Gaytan’s hair color is black and her eye color is dark brown.

Bibi Gaytan was born on 27 January 1972 in Tapachula, Mexico. She is the daughter of Daniel Gaytan and Silvia Barragan. Bibi Gaytan got married to Eduardo Capetillo in 1994. She has five children. Her Zodiac Sign is Aquarius. Her Ethnicity is Mixed. Her Nationality is Mexican.

Music groups: Timbiriche (1989–1991), Muñecos de Papel

Bibi Gaytan Facts

She was born on January 27, 1972, in Tapachula, Chiapas, Mexico.

She is the sister of actor Alejandro Gaytan and musician Chacho Gaytan.

She considers herself “Tabasqueña”.

She performed with Timbiriche from 1989 to 1992 and was also part of the music group Muñecos De Papel.

She released her debut solo album, Bibi Gaytán in September 1992.

She released her second studio album titled Manzana Verde in 1994.

Read: Doja Cat and Gloria Estefan.
